long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The QLIK Sense Scroller is designed to be used in conjunction with the Analytics Tool QLIK Sense. It extends its functionality to be used as scrolling passive display (such as on a communal television). This makes it act like an auto-scrolling presentation between each sheet on a dashboard on a infinite loop. Additionally, this extension allows you to pause and adjust the timing each sheet is shown.
